products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright, sunny, yellow roller blind brightens any room, making this quality dimout made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

products.title: Splash Mellow Yellow Roller Blind
products.description: This pastel mellow yellow roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering, and moisture resistant properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dusty yellow fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary grey scheme.
